lead_paragraph: Calling Tokyo's proposed $20 billion budget unacceptable, IOC vice president John Coates urged Japanese organizers on Friday to find ways to make the 2020 Olympics more affordable.

headline.print_headline: IOC Will Not Sign Off on Tokyo's $20b Budget for 2020 Games
headline.main: IOC Will Not Sign Off on Tokyo's $20b Budget for 2020 Games

snippet: Calling Tokyo's proposed $20 billion budget unacceptable, IOC vice president John Coates urged Japanese organizers on Friday to find ways to make the 2020 Olympics more affordable....
